name: Head It!: VR Soccer Heading Game
description: Use your whole body and go for the goal! Introducing a soccer heading game for the HTC Vive on Steam. Take the pass from your teammate and head the ball in! Beat the goalkeeper to earn points and aim for the top rankings.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: 1x USB 2.0 or better port also required
